title: Bookjacket, Bookjacket for "Essays on Freedom & Power" by Lord Acton, Meridian Books, 1955
title_raw: Bookjacket for "Essays on Freedom & Power" by Lord Acton, Meridian Books
medium: Lithography in gold, navy, white and pink ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover vertically in white ink at lower right in script: lustig
On the top half of the page in gold, white and pink ink: essays on [gold]/ freedom [white]/ and power [pink]/ LORD ACTON [white]
Across the bottom in gold and white: MERIDIAN BOOKS [gold] published by The Noonday Press/ M12 $1.25 [white]
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The front cover is navy blue and the back cover is gold. The title, author and publishers' names are vertically written down the spine. On the back cover is the title, author's name, synopsis and review of the book. Produced for Meridian Press.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket, Bookjacket for "Essays on Freedom & Power" by Lord Acton, Meridian Books, 1955. Lithography in gold, navy, white and pink ink on white shiny wove paper. 
Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-182.
